sentences.english: Lazy and inattentive in class. Unsatisfactory results, should work harder.
sentences.chinese: 懶惰及上課不留心，各科成績欠佳，必須加倍努力。

sentences.english: Roberto was fired after the water polo team had been below par.
sentences.chinese: 由於水球隊表演欠佳，羅伯託被解僱了。

sentences.english: I’ve had no exercise for ages；I’m really out of condition.
sentences.chinese: 我已好久沒鍛鍊了，現在健康狀況欠佳。

sentences.english: The total scale has better content reliability and bad construction validity.
sentences.chinese: 總量表的內容效度良好，結構效度欠佳。

sentences.english: His poor health disbarred him from further service in the army.
sentences.chinese: 因身體欠佳，他不能繼續在軍隊服役。

sentences.english: This suggests that AQ technique is not proper in evaluating right ventricular function.
sentences.chinese: 提示用AQ法檢測右心功能的準確性欠佳。

sentences.english: I pretty much mastered the hip-driven, shoulder-driven not so much.
sentences.chinese: 我更擅長的是控制臀部的驅動，而肩膀的驅動欠佳。

sentences.english: Diluted acids and alkalies have little effect, though if highly concentrated tend to make the hose less pliable.
sentences.chinese: 即使高度壓縮也只是使軟管彈性欠佳，無其他影響。

sentences.english: Chest flap has less effect on the avulsed wound of the whole finger.
sentences.chinese: 整指撕脫傷用胸壁皮瓣修復效果欠佳。

sentences.english: If you are not healthy you will probably think about your health.
sentences.chinese: 如果你身體欠佳，你很可能會想到你的健康問題。

definition: range (the difference between the lowest and highest values)
lame (unimpressive)/a huge letdown/not to try at all
